tool_description: Retrieves real-time tracking information for shipments across multiple carriers and provides delivery status updates.

tracking_number.description: The shipment tracking number to look up

carrier_code.description: Carrier identifier (UPS, FEDEX, DHL, USPS, etc.)

include_history.description: Whether to include full tracking history or just current status

error_messages: Invalid tracking number: Ensure the tracking number format matches the carrier's requirements.
Unsupported carrier: Use a supported carrier code (UPS, FEDEX, DHL, USPS, etc.)
Tracking information unavailable: The carrier's tracking system may be down or the shipment may not be in the system yet.
usage: Provide a valid tracking_number and carrier_code. Set include_history to false if you only need current status. The tool returns comprehensive tracking data including location and estimated delivery.

status.description: Current shipment status (in_transit, delivered, exception, etc.)

current_location.description: Current shipment location or facility name

tracking_events.description: List of tracking event descriptions with timestamps
